div.p: Students and parents must read, sign and return this agreement to indicate they will follow its provisions.

ol.li: Access to technology at MYIS is a privilege. Access to the network and internet connection is available to students for school purposes only.
Students' use of technology must be in support of teaching and learning in accordance with the educational goals and objectives of MYIS.
Only school-approved software should be used on school devices.
Students are not permitted to use social networking websites or chat services through the school network/on the MYIS iPad.
Students should tell a teacher/parent if they see a site or content that should be blocked.
Students should tell a teacher if they see any problems with the device.
Students should keep devices in good working condition and return it in the same condition in which it was received, excepting normal wear from usage.
Students should keep the device secure at all times and not relinquish possession of it to anyone else aside from their teacher/parent.
Students are liable for any damage or loss of the devices issued to them and agree to reimburse the school for replacement fees in the event the device is lost, stolen or damaged.

ol.li: The use of the MYIS iPad is only for Distance Learning purposes only.
There should not be any new applications or software added to the iPad at any time.
Parents/families take full responsibility for the return of the MYIS iPad in perfect working order and in the same state it was borrowed in.
